1: I sing of mercy and justice continually.
2: I walk wisely at home with integrity and a whole heart.
3: I focus my eyes on good; integrity shapes my actions
4: I cultivate integrity and keep company with the upright.
5: I speak well of neighbors and keep a humble heart.
6: Integrity and faithfulness bring closeness and service.
7: I fill my home and presence with honesty and truth.
8: I promptly uphold justice to keep the city thriving.
